title: Hideout.Start
body:
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController openingshot>>
<<changeSceneObject SceneShotController CrowdLooking>>
Hey uhh
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shotonbar>>
...
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController rockycloseup>>
She's cool guys, I know her
<<changeSceneObject SceneShotController EmmaAtBar>>
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController emmacloseup>>
Where is this place?
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController pianocloseup>>
It's a little hideout we run
how did you find it?
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController emmacloseup>>
I dunno, I sleepwalk a lot
end up in places I shouldn't be...
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController rockycloseup>>
Well, want a drink?
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController emmacloseup>>
...
Yeah
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController pianocloseup>>
Not sure how that piano can hold a tune
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController emmacloseup>>
What do we do rocky?
Are we just going to work until we die?
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController rockycloseup>>
well....
listen
there's a pipe in your camp
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController emmacloseup>>
a pipe?
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController rockycloseup>>
yeah, just like the one you sleep walked through
anyway, walk into it
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController emmacloseup>>
and?
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController pianocloseup>>
you'll see...
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController emmacloseup>>
alright.
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController rockycloseup>>
Are you enjoying your drink?
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController emmacloseup>>
I haven't had any
but I feel kind of
sleepy...
<<returnToCampScene SceneShotController>>
